Is{G2076} not{G3756} this{G3778} the carpenter{G3588}, the son{G3588} of Mary{G3137}, the brother{G80} of James{G2385}, and{G2532} Joses{G2499}, and{G2532} of Juda{G2455}, and{G2532} Simon{G4613}? and{G2532} are{G1526} not{G3756} his{G846} sisters{G3588} here{G5602} with{G4314} us{G2248}? And{G2532} he marvelled{G2296} because{G1223} of their{G846} unbelief{G3588}. And{G2532} he went{G4013} round about{G2945} the villages{G3588}, teaching{G1321}.

And{G2532} he called{G4341} unto him the twelve{G1427}, and{G2532} began{G756} to send{G649} them{G846} forth{G649} by two{G1417} and two{G1417}; and{G2532} gave{G1325} them{G846} power{G1849} over unclean{G169} spirits{G3588};

But{G1161} when Herod{G3588} heard{G191} thereof, he said{G2036}, It{G3778} is{G2076} John{G2491}, whom{G3739} I{G1473} beheaded{G607}: he{G846} is risen{G1453} from{G1537} the dead{G3498}.

Therefore{G1161} Herodias{G2266} had a quarrel{G1758} against him{G846}, and{G2532} would{G2309} have killed{G615} him{G846}; but{G2532} she could{G1410} not{G3756}:

And{G2532} he commanded{G2004} them{G846} to make{G347} all{G3956} sit down{G347} by companies{G4849} upon{G1909} the green{G5515} grass{G5528}.

And{G2532} when they{G846} were come out{G1831} of{G1537} the ship{G3588}, straightway{G2112} they knew{G1921} him{G846},
